wikipedia_page.main: John Robert Morgan (born 11 July 1950) is a British academic working at Swansea University in Wales. He is primarily known for writing books on Classics, and for contributing to a number of journals, often with colourful views.

response: *  1950   – J. R. Morgan, Welsh author and academic
* J. R. Morgan (born 1950), classicist and author, Swansea University
*J. R. Morgan, British academic and author
